item.description:
At our next meeting June 19th at 7:pm

Hal Shurtleff
Regional Field Director of The John Birch Society
On the Dangers of Agenda 21

INTRODUCTION OF AGENDA 21: "Effective execution of Agenda 21 will require a profound reorientation of all human society, unlike anything the world has ever experienced — a major shift in the priorities of both governments and individuals and an unprecedented redeployment of human and financial resources. This shift will demand that a concern for the environmental consequences of every human action be integrated into individual and collective decision-making at every level."

These events can't work without you...

Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting Every third Tuesday of the month @ 7 p.m. Sonoma Grille, 7366 Post Rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852 401-295-0800 Easy to get to, Cold beer and Great food. (What else could you ask for?) I talked to the manager John, and we have the back room to ourselves with the fireplace. All are welcome, Please RSVP if you can and tell a friend.  Go to: "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" on facebook or oathkeepers.org for more info. "Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson 401-952-5015
item.name: The Dangers of Agenda 21, Hal Shurtleff Regional Field Director of JBS
